hadith.text: Narrated Ibn Abi Laila: Zaid b. Arqam used to utter four takbirs (Allah is Most Great) over our dead person (during prayer). He uttered five takbirs on a dead person. So I asked him. He replied: The Messenger of Allah (ï·º) used to utter those. Abu Dawud said: I remember the tradition of Ibn al-Muthanna in a more guarded way
